title: Historia Judaica
additional-note: Catalog records suggest this journal was published in what is now the Czech Republic, and in New York.  We do not know when it was published in these locations, but contents of any issues first published in Europe, and not published at the same time in the US, may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
